title: Login issue
description: User unable to log in with correct credentials.

title: Payment failure
description: Credit card payment not processing for multiple customers.

title: Slow website loading
description: Pages take more than 10 seconds to load.

title: Bug in cart update
description: Items not updating properly when quantity is changed.

title: Email not received
description: Order confirmation emails not sent to customers.

title: App crash on checkout
description: Mobile app crashes during checkout process.

title: Search not working
description: Search returns no results even for valid keywords.

title: Profile update error
description: Users unable to update their profile information.

title: Duplicate order issue
description: Some customers are charged twice for the same order.

title: Notification delay
description: Push notifications delayed by more than 30 minutes.

title: Broken image links
description: Product images not displaying on several category pages.

title: Refund not processed
description: Refund requests remain pending beyond 7 business days.
